featured.text: But no matter what a child eats, brushing after each meal is still the best way to fight cavities.
Their relaxing bath will be 17 a full fluff dry and brush-out.
For 20 minutes, we walked along a path past tall weeds, banana trees, and low brush.

definition.zh_def: 刷子；用於清潔、塗抹或畫畫的工具。
definition.en_def: A tool with bristles, used for cleaning, painting, or applying substances.
definition.example: She used a brush to paint the fence.
